content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 40-47)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5) - properly connected
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5) - now with 41 coal remaining
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5) - operational
- Connected pipe network (positions -8.5,-0.5 to -5.5,0.5)
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 8.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Operation at position (19.5, 74.5)
(No changes from previous report)

### Steel Production Line at position (18.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest (position 18.5, 15.5) - empty
- Stone furnace (position 21.0, 15.0) - operational but no input
- Output wooden chest (position 24.5, 15.5) - empty
- Inserter (position 19.5, 15.5) - now connected to power

### Iron Smelting Column at position (12.0, 15.0)
(No changes from previous report)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent placement distance errors (steps 41,47)
- Move within 10 tiles before placing entities
- Implement position verification before placement attempts
- Create movement helper functions for construction areas

### Water obstruction issues (steps 42,43)
- Survey terrain before attempting placements
- Implement water detection checks
- Consider landfill options for water areas

### Entity reference failures (step 41)
- Verify entity existence before referencing
- Implement error handling for missing entities
- Consider entity caching system

### Production line setup issues
- Verify input materials are present before testing (step 40)
- Monitor inserter operation status (step 40)
- Ensure proper power coverage for all components

### Resource management
- Maintain adequate coal supply for power generation
- Monitor iron ore inventory levels
- Balance resource allocation between production lines

### Expansion planning
- Implement systematic land surveying (steps 44-46)
- Develop clear area detection algorithms
- Consider modular base design for easier expansion

## NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- steel_furnace: Entity - Reference to primary steel production furnace
- power_pole: Position - Reference to power infrastructure location
- iron_furnaces: List[Entity] - References to iron smelting furnaces
- output_chests: List[Entity] - References to production output storage
- belt_network: List[Entity] - References to transport belt system
- new_furnace_pos: Position - Planned location for additional furnace
